DPRK delegation leaves
    Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation led by Kang Tong Gun, vice-president of the Academy of Sciences, left here on June 22 to  participate in the  world scientific conference to be held in Budapest.

Russian embassy officials help farmers
articles.content:
Russian embassy officials help farmers
   Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Russian ambassador to Korea Valery Denisov and embassy officials visited the Korea-Russia Friendship Kochang Cooperative Farm on June 22 to help it in farming.
   During a break they deepened friendly feelings with farmers, talking and singing together.
   They presented to the farm materials for farming which carry their sincerity.

S. Korean unionists' struggle goes on
articles.content:
S. Korean unionists' struggle goes on
   Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- The South Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a rally in Seoul on June 19 demanding a probe into the truth behind the prosecution's act of "inducing" the mint company trade union to strike and a punishment of those involved in it with the attendance of leading members of the organization and members of the trade union, more than 500 in all, who had been in a hunger strike for six consecutive days, according to a radio report from Seoul.   
   Stating that the South Korean authorities were chiefly responsible for this incident because they enforced "restructuring" with main stress put on layoff in order to ensure the security of their power, the rallies demanded a stop to the "security-oriented labour policy" and "restructuring" and a guarantee for jobs.
   The authorities  are working hard to calm down criticism of the act of "inducing unionists to strike" and gloss it over, they noted,  and renewed their resolution to launch a widespread struggle including an indefinite hunger strike and a general strike till their demand is met.

Greetings to Mozambican President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mozambican President
    Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, on Monday sent a message of greetings to Mozambican President Joaquim Alberto Chissano on the occasion of the 24th anniversary of the founding of the Republic of Mozambique.
   It wished the Mozambican President and people great successes in their work for stability and prosperity of the country and expressed the belief that the good friendly and cooperative relations existing between the two countries would continue to strengthen and develop.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Il from Indonesian minister
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Il from Indonesian minister
   Pyongyang, June 23 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il received a gift from the Coordinating Minister for Policy and Security of Indonesia.
   The gift was handed to Kim Il Chol, Minister of the People's Armed Forces, by Coordinating Minister Feisal Tanjung on a visit to the DPRK.
